Adversarial Attacks¶

Adversarial attacks are made to Torch Tensors using FGSM

Defenses¶

Adversarial attacks are made to Torch Tensors using FGSM

defenses.bit_squeeze(x, bits=7)[source]¶

Implementation of colour bit squeezing.

Parameters:
  • x (NumPy Array) – Original image
  • bits (int) – The number of bits to reduce the image too
Returns:

Squeezed image
Return type:

NumPy Array
defenses.bit_squeeze_torch(x, bits=7)[source]¶

Perform bit squeezing on a torch array which will be of shape [n, 1, w, h] for a batch of n images

Parameters:
  • x (Tensor) – Tensor of images
  • bits (7) – Bits for which images should be scaled to
Returns:

Tensor of squeezed bits
